forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
